Question: The baptismal record gives his name in Latinized form as Joannes Chrysostomus Wolfgangus Theophilus ****.
Hints: In January 1781, this person's opera Idomeneo premiered with "considerable success" in Munich.
In 1787 the young Ludwig van Beethoven spent several weeks in Vienna, hoping to study with this person.
This person would sometimes switch his focus between operas and instrumental music.
